titleStmt.title: A call unto the seed of Israel that they may come out of Egypts darkness and house of bondage unto the land of rest : also the righteous law of God justified : with an epistle to all those whose desire are after the truth as it is in Jesus where ever they are scattered : also twenty five queries to all the worlds priests and people that say the light of Christ is natural / by M.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, Margaret Askew Fell, 1614-1702.
